dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.
dependent_to.name: py-cartopy

dependent_to.description:
Python script to download global terrain digital elevation models, SRTM
30m DEM and SRTM 90m DEM.
dependent_to.name: py-elevation

dependent_to.description:
FORD, standing for FORtran Documenter, is an automatic documentation
generator for modern Fortran programs.
dependent_to.name: py-ford

dependent_to.description:
A Language Server for Fortran providing code completion, diagnostics,
hovering and more.
dependent_to.name: py-fortls

dependent_to.description:
This project is based upon the Fortran parser originally developed by
Pearu Peterson for the F2PY project, www.f2py.com. It provides a parser
for Fortran source code (up to and including F2008) implemented purely
in Python with minimal dependencies.
dependent_to.name: py-fparser

dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib

dependent_to.description: NiTransforms -- Neuroimaging spatial transforms in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-nitransforms

dependent_to.description:
pytest-html is a plugin for pytest that generates a HTML report for test
results
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-html

dependent_to.description: screed: a Python library for loading FASTA and FASTQ sequences.
dependent_to.name: py-screed

dependent_to.description:
TomoPy is an open-source Python package for tomographic data processing
and image reconstruction.
dependent_to.name: py-tomopy

dependent_to.description: Experiments with new file format for tractography.
dependent_to.name: py-trx-python

dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python
dependent_to.name: py-xarray

dependent_to.description: scalable pythonic model fitting for high energy physics
dependent_to.name: py-zfit

dependent_to.description: zfit model fitting interface for HEP
dependent_to.name: py-zfit-interface

dependent_to.description: Tools and models to extend zfit with physics specific content.
dependent_to.name: py-zfit-physics

description:
This is a setuptools_scm plugin that adds support for git archives (for
example the ones GitHub automatically generates).
name: py-setuptools-scm-git-archive

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
